name: Miss Turner's Magical Pet Swap Shop
name_original: Miss Turner's Magical Pet Swap Shop
description:
How to Play
  • Click and drag parts of the animal to reshape it
  • Move the mouse left/right or up/down to control different aspects
  • Submit the animal when it matches the customer's request
  • You lose one star for every incorrect submission
Features
  • Create your own cute and silly animals
  • Adjust the animal in 15 dimensions
  • Fun scoring system based on user reviews
  • Developed in 72 hours for Ludum Dare #35, with the theme "shapeshift"
Credits
  • Design, code, and art by Rose Abernathy
  • Created with Phaser
  • Music: "Break Away Remix" by Rick Dickert from freesoundtrackmusic.com
